name: The Beatles
bio: The Beatles were an English rock band formed in Liverpool in 1960.

name: Led Zeppelin
bio: Led Zeppelin were an English rock band formed in London in 1968.

name: Pink Floyd
bio: Pink Floyd were an English rock band formed in London in 1965.

name: Bob Dylan
bio: Bob Dylan is an American singer-songwriter who has been a major figure in popular music for over six decades.

name: Bob Johnson
bio: Bob Johnson is a talented musician and singer-songwriter.
